name: JHenTai
subtitle: A cross-platform manga app made for e-hentai & exhentai by Flutter.
description:
A manga app for E-Hentai, supporting Android & iOS & Windows & MacOS & Linux.

Still in development stage, welcome to submit issues or feature requests.

apps.name: JHenTai
apps.subtitle: A cross-platform manga app made for e-hentai & exhentai by Flutter.
apps.localizedDescription:
A manga app for E-Hentai, supporting Android & iOS & Windows & MacOS & Linux.

Still in development stage, welcome to submit issues or feature requests.

versions.localizedDescription:
- 新增画廊详情页多标签选择功能
  - 支持通过按钮启用多选模式
  - 可以选择多个标签进行组合搜索（AND 逻辑）
  - 选中的标签会显示绿色勾选标记
  - 提供取消多选和搜索所选标签的功能
- 修复 release workflow 脚本语法错误

--------------------

- Add multi-tag selection feature for gallery details page
  - Support enabling multi-select mode via button
  - Select multiple tags for combined search (AND logic)
  - Selected tags show green checkmark indicator
  - Provide cancel multi-select and search selected tags functionality
- Fix release workflow script syntax error
